name: Holdium
description: Holdium is a Token Exclusively for Hodlers. Holdium ($HM) is a Solana token rewarding long-term meme coin holders through an 18-month vested airdrop program, with eligibility based on selection of previously held Solana meme coins as well as an airdrop to Solana Mobile Chapter 2 token holders. Users who sell their airdrop allocation early have the remainder of their airdrops burned, in a weekly burn ceremony - incentivizing a strong holder base.
